work.summary: Developed new features of our core micro services oriented RESTful SaaS (Node.js, Restify, AWS Cloudformation, AWS Lambda)
highlights: Built an On-Premise CI/CD pipeline with unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing framework on top of AWS infrastructures (Jenkins, Node.js ES6, Grunt, Boto3, EC2, S3, CloudWatch, AWS CloudFormation, Mocha, Protractor, Selenuim, Phantom.js, CodeClimate, Istanbul)

Researched on NLP Interactive Model, prototyped a voice-controlled natural language interface of our core services, with sequential inference and contextual awareness (AWS Alexa + Lambda + API Gateway, Azure Cognitive Services, Python, Flask, Zappa)

Built an extremely flexible and powerful API Automation Services Application with dynamic adaptor created in Runtime that enables end users to codelessly integrate any solution of our SaaS with 500+ Web APIs including Google Suites, Salesforce, Quickbook, Slack, Facebook, Twitter (Node.js ES6, Zapier, Travis CI, AWS Lambda)
Developed quantitative analysis using various metric of performance (R)
Designed and implemented infrastructure of this research project with Microservices Architecture design (Ruby/Rails)
